summary: This mod changes the death items of Deer, Small Elk, Large Elk, Goats, Rabbits, Horkers and Mammoths.
descriptionHtml:
1.2
Fixed Jerked Meat recipe to show when you have raw venison as well as foodvenison so you don\'t have to exit the cooking pot to make jerked meat.

1.1
Changed the name of the plugin from hunter.esp to GrrantusHuntingRework.esp to avoid conflicts.

1.0
This mod changes the following:
Alters death items for  Deer, Small Elk, Large Elk, Goats, Rabbits, Horkers and Mammoths.
Changes the weight of Leather01 to .4.

This mod Adds the following:
Hides for  Deer, Small Elk, Large Elk, Goats, Horkers and Mammoths
Carcasses for  Deer, Small Elk, Large Elk, Goats, Rabbits, Horkers and Mammoths

Additional recipes:
Butcher Goat: converts Goat carcass to 4 goat legs
Butcher Horker: converts Horker carcass to 10 horker meat
Butcher Mammoth: converts Mammoth carcass to 10 Raw Mammoth
Butcher Rabbit: converts Rabbit carcass to 2 rabbit legs
Butcher Venison: converts Raw Venison to 10 Venison
Mammoth Fillets: converts Raw Mammoth into 10 Mammoth Filets
Deer hide: converts deer hide to 4 leather
Small elk hide: converts small elk hide to 8 leather
Large elk hide: converts large elk hide to 10 leather
Goat hide: converts goat hide to 3 leather
Horker hide: converts horker hide into 30 leather
Mammoth hide: converts mammoth hide into 50 leather

Additional Food recipes:
Jerked Meat (can use venison or mammoth)
Rabbit in Tomato (Boosts archery and sneak)
Rabbit stew (restores 15 health and magicka, Increases magicka regen +1 for 12 minutes)
author: grrantu
